v1.headline: Amazon PPC Without Over-reliance on Automation | Few clients, maximum focus | Grow Sales by 30% in the first 4 Weeks On A Pay-On-Results Basis
v1.about:
PPC Jumpstart is a performance-driven Amazon PPC accelerator offering a data-backed, human-managed four-week framework that guarantees a 30%+ increase in revenue - or your money back.

Precision Targeted Framework™ - a performance-driven PPC program designed for brands doing $1M+ in annual sales.

Here’s how it works:

1) Focused Execution → I only take on a handful of clients at a time, so you get my direct expertise (no interns or middlemen).
2) Plateau Breaking → Proven campaign structures + placement optimization to unlock new revenue channels and hit record sales months.
3) Performance Alignment → Pay-on-results model ensures my success is tied to yours.
4) Fast Impact → Brands typically see measurable profit growth within 30 days.

-----

Started down the “safe” path as an engineer.

Worked at six different companies, but wanted more — freedom, travel, and control of my time.
Picked up The 4HWW by Tim F. and started plotting my escape.

Became a solopreneur — importing from China, running Shopify stores, doing it all myself.

Then found Amazon, launched BEASLY CLAWS (premium weightlifting gear), and scaled it to $200K in sales.
No team. No safety net. Just obsession.

Today, I run PPC Jumpstart — a 1-man Amazon PPC service.

I personally manage every account, from $20K/month budgets to multi-million-dollar stores.
$25M+ in ad sales this year alone.

Why personal service?

Because when I was running my own stores, I saw how easy it was to become “just another account” at a big agency.
I decided I’d never run my business that way.
My clients get direct access to me, my full attention, and strategies tailored to their exact goals. 

Here's my Precision Targeted Framework:

-Target the right keywords
-Optimize bids with surgical precision
-Build campaigns to scale without waste

(No autopilot ads, I keep the robots where they belong: making coffee.)

If you run an Amazon brand spending $30K+/month, I can show you where the money leaks and where the growth is hiding.

The best part? If you pass my audit before becoming a client — and most stores don’t — your results are guaranteed.

Send me “AUDIT” for my 10-Step Campaign Audit.
